snippet.title: Rip Them Off | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/12...
Purchase on iOS: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1500176379

Rip Them Off is a new puzzle game of economic management and tower defense with an original jazz soundtrack and gorgeous 1950s-styled visuals. The Board needs profit, and it’s up to you to line the streets with shops the masses can’t resist. Choose your locations, pick your stores and earn your way up the corporate ladder and its increasingly difficult challenges! 

Out now on Steam (PC, Mac, Linux) and iOS.

Follow us on social media for news & updates:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/lozange_lab
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lozange.lab/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LozangeLab
Imgur: https://imgur.com/gallery/GK9Exqh
...and join our community on Discord: https://discord.gg/U4bv5WA
